name: Go To Pot
description:
Resist until potion is cooked, get back slimes to pot but be careful, ff you break those things they will multiply, this can escalate quickly!

V1.1: More difficult
V1.2: It was too hard

VR/TouchController needed
Tested on Oculus Rift (VIVE should work too, let me know)
You can rotate yourself with thumbsticks but 360° is highly recommended

Hard
Medium
Easy
ForFun

This is a #ue4jam summer 2018 submission
https://itch.io/jam/2018-summer-ue4jam
